taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans!

taunt.immunity: is decorated for strategic thinking and is not interested in offering a challenge in battle
taunt.text: You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans!

taunt.immunity: is decorated for strategic thinking and is not interested in offering a challenge in battle
taunt.text: You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

taunt.immunity: falls asleep during readings of the Holy Scrolls
taunt.text: You call yourself pious, I bet you don't even face Galactic North when you pray!

taunt.immunity: bribed the shipyards to add upgraded targetting systems and shields
taunt.text: Thank you for providing a target drone for us to shoot at!

taunt.immunity: loves the bachelor life
taunt.text: Your kids will miss you when I get done blowing you into space dust!

taunt.immunity: thinks all Arvonians should have equal standing
taunt.text: Your Princess Azmadine couldn't run a party, never mind a fleet.

taunt.immunity: is married to the navy
taunt.text: Your husband doesn't even know how to cook!

taunt.immunity: thinks space whales are a danger to the space lanes
taunt.text: Have you seen any space whales? We killed all the ones back home and are looking for new hunting grounds.

taunt.immunity: requires his entire crew to shower twice daily and pumps air freshner through the life support system.
taunt.text: Do you smell something? Oh wait, that's you!

taunt.immunity: grew up an orphan
taunt.text: Your father is a Whale hugger!

taunt.immunity: personally polishes the main gun every day
taunt.text: Let me get out my microscope so I can look at your puny gun.

taunt.immunity: is batting for the home team
taunt.text: Looks like I'll be doing the ladies a favor taking you out of the gene pool!

taunt.immunity: has just finished repainting his warship
taunt.text: You flew through space in that bucket of bolts?

taunt.immunity: thinks corporations are endless red tape
taunt.text: You'll be lucky if you ever get a promotion working like that!
We are not your enemy!
You actually eat asteroids? Disgusting!.

taunt.immunity: looks sharp, and dresses sharper
taunt.text: You're never getting a date dressed like that!

taunt.immunity: fought in five campaigns, is covered in battle won scars.
taunt.text: You'll be running when the first salvo explodes a parsec away.

taunt.immunity: has lived their entire life in a spaceship
taunt.text: Don't worry, we'd never attack the Ximni homeworld, it's already a dump!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: isn't familiar with Terran animals
taunt.text: You're nothing but pirhana bait!

taunt.immunity: has a well maintained personal appearance
taunt.text: Your breath could kill a space whale!

taunt.immunity: grew up next to a major information hub
taunt.text: Why don't you move to someplace more civilized, like Kralia!

taunt.immunity: keeps a small community together for fun
taunt.text: Nobody cares about you and your friends!

taunt.immunity: has no regard for basic human decency
taunt.text: Your parents were truly exceptional to raise such a brilliant talking anus!

long_desc.text: TSN Cruiser^Standard long patrol vessel of the TSN.^2 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock.
TSN Scout^Long range scout vessel of the TSN.^1 forward beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 6 homing, 2 mines, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
TSN Battleship^Beam-heavy combat vessel of the TSN.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 5 PShock.
TSN Missile Cruiser^Specialized vessel of the TSN.^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 8 nukes, 20 homing, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 6 PShock.
TSN Dreadnought^Ultimate wartime vessel of the TSN.^3 primary beams^1 main beam cannon^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 nukes, 10 homing, 8 mines, 5 ECM, 4 PShock.
TSN Medium Carrier^Standard carrier of the TSN.^2 primary beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 1 nukes, 6 homing, 4 mines, 2 ECM, 2 PShock.
TSN Mine Layer^Specialized vessel of the TSN. Fast and tough.^1 primary beam^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 10 homing and 25 mines.
TSN Juggernaut^Secret REAL ultimate wartime vessel of the TSN.^2 primary beams^2 main beam cannons^4 Torpedo tubes^Massive stores and 3 fighters.
Ximni Cruiser^Standard vessel of the Ximni.^3 beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Scout^Long range scout vessel of the Ximni.^1 forward beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 6 homing, 2 mines, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
Ximni Missile Cruiser^Specialized vessel of the Ximni.^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 8 nukes, 20 homing, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 6 PShock.
Ximni Battleship^Beam-heavy combat vessel of the Ximni.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 5 PShock.
Ximni Carrier^Standard carrier of the Ximni.^2 forward beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 1 nukes, 6 homing, 4 mines, 2 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Dreadnought^Ultimate wartime vessel of the Ximni.^2 primary beams, long range and fast firing^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 nukes, 10 homing, 8 mines, 5 ECM, 4 PShock.
Pirate Strongbow^Pirate raider.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 12 homing, 12 ECM, 8 PShock.
Pirate Longbow^Pirate scout.^1 forward beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 1 Mine, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
Pirate Brigantine^Pirate corvette and light carrier.^2 forward beams, 1 rear beam^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 12 homing, 12 ECM, 8 PShock.
Infiltrator Corvette^1 Beam Turret^1 Torpedo Tube^Stores for 4 Homing, 1 Nuke, 3 Mines, 2 EMP, 1 PShock^Shields Front 40 Rear 40
Vanguard Corvette^1 Forward Beam^1 Torpedo Tube^Stores for 4 Homing, 1 Nuke, 3 Mines, 2 EMP, 1 PShock^Shields Front 40 Rear 40
Eliminator Corvette^1 Focused Beam^1 Torpedo Tube^Stores for 4 Homing, 1 Nuke, 3 Mines, 2 EMP, 1 PShock^Shields Front 40 Rear 40
Harrier Missile Corvette^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 40 Rear 40
Viper Tactical Support Carrier^4 Fighters.^Shields [None] Front 0 Rear 0
Loki-class Jump Frigate. ^4 Side-mounted Beams^Forward Chaser Battery^Fractionary Point Defense Array^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 6 Homing, 4 Nukes, 0 Mines, 8 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 60 Rear 60

Interdictor Heavy Frigate^Excells at striking unprotected enemy flanks.^2 Fore/Aft Medium Beams (Best firepower to the sides)^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 65 Rear 65
Patrolman Beam Destroyer^2 Forward Beams^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Executor Heavy Beam Destroyer^4 Beams^0 Torpedo Tubes^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Falcon Destroyer^2 Beam Turrets^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Archer Destroyer^2 Focused Beams^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Napalm Missile Destroyer^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80

TSN Mosquito Light Carrier^Destroyer with a varied toolkit used for escort duties.^2 rapid beams^1 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 Homing, 1 Nuke, 3 Mines, 2 EMPs, 1 PShock.^2 Fighters^Shields Front 60 Rear 60
Invader Cruiser^3 Beam Turrets^3 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 12 Homing, 3 Nukes, 9 Mines, 6 EMP, 3 PShock.^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Riptide Cruiser^3 Forward Beams^3 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 12 Homing, 3 Nukes, 9 Mines, 6 EMP, 3 PShock.^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Lightning Cruiser^3 Focused Beams^3 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 12 Homing, 3 Nukes, 9 Mines, 6 EMP, 3 PShock.^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Long Arm Missile Cruiser^6 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 24 Homing, 6 Nukes, 18 Mines, 12 EMP, 6 PShock.^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Flotilla Carrier^2 Forward Beams^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Fighters 4^Shields Front 80 Rear 80

Kestrel Escort Cruiser^Jump drive ship from Ambrosia Software's Escape Velocity.^2 Fore/1 Aft Beams (Best firepower to the sides)^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^2 Heavy Fighters.^Shields Front 100 Rear 100

TSN Heavy Cruiser^Versatile warship well equipped for any role.^2 Fore/1 Aft Beams (Side overlap)^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^2 Support Fighters^Shields Front 100 Rear 100
Thunder Battlecruiser^4 Forward Beams^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 160 Rear 160
Ironsides Battlecruiser^4 Fore/Aft Beams (Best firepower to the sides)^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 160 Rear 160
Storm Battlecarrier^3 Forward Beams^3 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 12 Homing, 3 Nukes, 9 Mines, 6 EMP, 3 PShock.^Fighters 4^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Tsunami Heavy Carrier^2 Forward Beams^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Fighters 8^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Reaver Battleship^2 Focused Beams, 2 Forward Beams, 2 Beam Turrets^6 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 24 Homing, 6 Nukes, 18 Mines, 12 EMP, 6 PShock.^Fighters 2^Shields Front 240 Rear 240
Armageddon Dreadnought^4 Focused, 2 Forward, 2 Beam Turrets^6 Torpedo Tubes with 2 Additional Stores^Stores for 44 Homing, 8 Nukes, 24 Mines, 16 EMP, 8 PShock.^Fighters 4^Shields Front 320 Rear 320
Supernova Jump Dreadnought (Jump Only)^8 Focused Beams^6 Torpedo Tubes with 2 Additional Stores^Stores for 44 Homing, 8 Nukes, 24 Mines, 16 EMP, 8 PShock.^Fighters 4^Shields Front 320 Rear 320

Species 8473 Dreadnought^Corvette maneuver and speed on a Dreadnought Hull^4 Focused Beams^2 Beam Turrets^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 200 Rear 200
Hellion Impulse Corvette^2 Forward Beams^2 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 8 Homing, 2 Nukes, 6 Mines, 4 EMP, 2 PShock.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80
Protector Impulse Destroyer^3 Forward Beams^3 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 12 Homing, 3 Nukes, 9 Mines, 6 EMP, 3 PShock.^Shields Front 120 Rear 120
Steamroller Impulse Cruiser^4 Forward Beams^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Shields Front 160 Rear 160
Earthquake Impulse Battlecruiser^2 Focused, 2 Forward, and 2 Beam Turrets^6 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 24 Homing, 6 Nukes, 18 Mines, 12 EMP, 6 PShock.^Fighters 2^Shields Front 240 Rear 240
Typhoon Impulse Battleship^2 Heavy Forward beams, and 4 Beam Turrets^4 Torpedo Tubes^Stores for 16 Homing, 4 Nukes, 12 Mines, 8 EMP, 4 PShock.^Fighters 6^Shields Front 280 Rear 280
An unarmed, long-range exploration ship. The hull is a Ximni design.^Shields Front 30 Rear 30
An unarmed travelling playground of the rich and powerful.^Shields Front 30 Rear 30
An unarmed bulk freighter, slowly moving cheap cargo between the stars.^Shields Front 30 Rear 30
An unarmed transport, slowly moving cargo between the stars.^Shields Front 80 Rear 80

A joint Terran-Ximni venture to create a Jump Mobile Starbase^Minimal tactical maneuverability (0.0006), but jump capable^2 Advanced Tunneling Warp Beams^2 Point Defense Beams^1 Torpedo Tube, 120 Homing, 4 Nukes, 8 EMP, 8 P Shock^10 Fighters^Shields Front 800 Rear 600
TSN Fighter^One rapid-fire beam, 1 homing torpedo.
TSN Bomber^One rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
TSN Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
TSN Long Range Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over longer distances.
TSN Gunship^The slowest of TSN shipborne craft, the Gunship compromises speed for superior maneuvering and carries warship-caliber beams.^Three capital-class beams, 1 homing torpedo.
Ximni Fighter^First draft of a Ximni player fighter.^One rapid-fire beam, 1 homing torpedo.
Ximni Bomber^One rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
Ximni Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Bus.
Ximni Long Range Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Ride.
Pirate Avenger^A pirate's fighter, light and nimble.^One fast-fire beam, 1 homing torpedo.
Pirate Adventure^A pirate's shuttle, light and nimble.
Lightning Fighter/Bomber^Compromises top speed for heavier beams.^Three capital-class beams, 2 homing torpedoes.
Captured Pirate Adventure^A 'repossessed' pirate's shuttle, light and nimble.
TSN Starbase with strong shields. It is armed with a standard base beam, and can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. May need help if attacked.
Civilian Starbase built by a local government. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
TSN Command Starbase with very strong shields. It is armed with a base beam and torpedoes, and can manufacture torps at twice the normal rate.
Manufacturing Starbase owned by a large Corporation. It is unarmed, but can build torpedoes at triple speed. Its defense should be a priority.
Research Starbase studying this sector. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Kralien Starbase. It has standard shields, and a base beam.
Arvonian Starbase. It has strong shields, a base beam, and carries a complement of 10 fighters.
Torgoth Starbase. It has very powerful shields, a long range base beam, and can fire drones.
Skaraan Starbase. It has powerful shields, and two base beams.
Light warship with forward beam weapons. Used to escort Earth's important cargos.
Medium warship with rapid fire beam weapons. Earth's most common system defense vessel, trading FTL Drive for speed and firepower.
An unarmed, long-range exploration ship. The hull is a Ximni design.
An unarmed bulk freighter, slowly moving cheap cargo between the stars.
An unarmed travelling playground of the rich and powerful.
Displacement: 9 kt. Armament: 2 x standard beams. The most common vessel in the known universe.
Displacement: 17 kt. Armament: 2 x rapid-fire beams. Heart of the Kralien fleet.
Displacement: 25 kt. Armament: 2 rapid fire beams, 1 heavy beam. The most dangerous Kralien ship.
Displacement: 9 kt. Armament: 1 forward beam. Fast and maneuverable.
Displacement: 9 kt. Armament: 2 x standard beams. The most common vessel in the known universe. This one seems different, it has strange power readings.
Displacement: 9 kt. Armament: 2 x defense beams. A variant enabling 360 fleet defense.
Displacement: 10 kt. Armament: 2 x Focused beams. A variant providing long range support.
Displacement: 17 kt. Armament: 1 light drone launcher. Fire support for the Kralien fleet.
Displacement: 25 kt. Four Kralien fighters.
Displacement: 0.015 kt. Armament: 1 very light beam.
Displacement: 0.015 kt. Armament: 2 light beams.
Displacement: 25 kt. Armament: 4 medium beams. Complement: 4 fighters.
Displacement: 45 kt. Armament: 6 long-range beams. Complement: 6 fighters.
Displacement: 45 kt. Armament: 6 point-defense beams. Complement: 8 fighters.
Displacement: 80 kt. Armament: 6 medium beams, 1 drone launcher.
Displacement: 90 kt. Armament: 4 medium beams, 1 heavy beam, 1 drone launcher.
Displacement: 150 kt. Armament: 10 standard beams, 1 drone launcher
Displacement: 150 kt. Armament: 10 standard beams, 1 drone launcher
Displacement: 90 kt. Armament: 1 forward beam, 1 4xSpeed light drone launcher.
Displacement: 80 kt. Boosted engines, Armament: 3 medium beams. 1 drone launcher
Displacement: 40 kt. Armament: 2 medium beams. The Skaraan's lightest warship.
Displacement: 50 kt. Armament: 4 standard beams. Usually travels alone.
Displacement: 70 kt. Armament: 2 super-heavy beams, 1 medium beam. Very dangerous.
Displacement: 38 kt. Armament: 2 medium beams. The Skaraan fast attack warship.
Displacement: 180 kt. Armament: 3 super-heavy beams, 1 medium beam. Do not approach from the front.
Infant stage of BioMech development. Typically docile, occasionally aggressive.
A BioMech in the childhood stage. Will eventually mature into an adult.
Young adult BioMech. This is the most aggressive stage of development. Proceed with caution.
Full grown adult BioMech. Capable of reproduction and communication.
